.@theshoresofme We now live in a world where, at any given moment, Joss & Co. could be off making a secret Shakespeare movie somewhere.

— Andy (@AndyDaglas) October 25, 2011

@theshoresofme Nathan Fillion as Macbeth! Jewel Staite as Cordelia! Anthony Stewart Head as King Lear!

— Rowan Kaiser (@RowanKaiser) October 25, 2011

@RowanKaiser @theshoresofme Summer Glau as the bear! #AWintersTale

@RowanKaiser @theshoresofme Enver Gjokaj as Iago! Gina Torres as Cleopatra!
